blurb: DataWeave is the programming language designed by MuleSoft for data transformation. It is also the expression language Mule runtime engine uses to configure components and connectors.

key_features.title: Functional
key_features.content: Includes pure, first-class, and high-order functions, composition, lambdas, and immutablility.

key_features.title: Statically typed
key_features.content: Every variable and function has a type known at compile time.

key_features.title: Immutable
key_features.content: All data in Dataweave is immutable.
